title: Bike Check: The Scott Foil RC of Romain Bardet and Team DSM-Firmenich PostNL
content:
Bardet's bike of choice features a Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 drivetrain, wheels, and a smattering of components from Syncros.

Read the full article at Bike Check: The Scott Foil RC of Romain Bardet and Team DSM-Firmenich PostNL on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
